H0.text: Long Island Sound separates Long Island from which American state. New York

H1.text: Long Island Sound separates Long Island from which American state. New Jersey

H2.text: Long Island Sound separates Long Island from which American state. Rhode Island

H3.text: Long Island Sound separates Long Island from which American state. Conn.

A4.text: It lies predominantly between the U.S. state of Connecticut to the north and Long Island in New York state to the south.

A5.text: The Bridgeport & Port Jefferson Ferry travels between Bridgeport, Connecticut, and Port Jefferson, New York.

A6.text: The state's access to the open Atlantic Ocean is both to the west (toward New York City) and to the east (toward the 'race' near Rhode Island).
